participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and humorous, with a love for adventure.
participant_1.background: I love to dance. I don t eat meat. I am witty. I love sharks.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about his hobbies, with a quirky sense of style.
participant_2.background: I m never still. I fix airplanes for a living. I drive junk cars that no one else wants. I prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
